sentences.english: The wind is still blowing wantonly, father like that tree, still leaves.

sentences.chinese: 空氣中的冷意就這樣肆意闖入了我的體內。

definition: see 恣意妄為|恣意妄为[zi4 yi4 wang4 wei2]
to let (sb do sth)/to allow/regardless of
to sprinkle/to shed (tears, blood etc)/fig. free, unconstrained/to write in a free style
lit. bashing sideways and colliding straight on (idiom); to push through shoving and bumping/to barge/to charge around violently
free and unconstrained (idiom); unfettered/unbuttoned/without care or worries
to ravage/to devastate/to trample on/to violate
